text: Vincent Paul Garbutt (20 November 1947 â€“ 6 June 2017) was an English folk singer and songwriter. A significant part of his repertoire consisted of protest songs covering topics such as "the Troubles" in Northern Ireland (Troubles of Erin), unemployment, and social issues. ==Death== Garbutt died at a hospital from complications caused by heart surgery on 6 June 2017 at the age of 69. ==Music== *The Valley of Tees (1972) *The Young Tin Whistle Pest (live) (1974) *King Gooden (1976) *Eston California (1977) *Tossin' a Wobbler (1978) *Little Innocents (1983) *Shy Tot Pommy (1985) [live - Mount Isa, Queensland, Australia] *When The Tide Turns (1989) *The By-Pass Syndrome (1991) *Bandalised (1994) *Plugged! (1995) [live - Red Lion Folk Club, Birmingham, UK.] *When the Tide Turns Again (1998) [reissue of 1989 album with one additional track] *Word Of Mouth (1999) *The Vin Garbutt Songbook Vol 1 (2003) *Persona ... Grata (2005) *Teesside Troubadour documentary & live DVD (2011) *Synthetic Hues (2014) ==References== ==Other websites== *The official Vin Garbutt website *Vin Garbutt's Myspace Page Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Disease-related deaths in England Category:English singer-songwriters Category:English guitarists Category:Folk musicians
title: Vin Garbutt
